}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "78T_V0.8" and "2019.08.20" are silk-screened on the board top.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3368 @1.5GHz :SoC: Octa-Core ARM (Cortex-A53) *GPU: ''PowerVR G6110'', supports :OpenGL 3.2, OpenGL ES 3.1, OpenCL 1.2 :4K UHD H.264/H.265 video playback *Storage: 8GB (eMMC 5.1) Flash *Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *WLAN: 1Ã—1 802.11abgn/ac (2.4/5GHz) *Network: 1x 100Mbps LAN port *Power Source: 12V/1.5A via barrel
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:CaptionCall 78T Internal.jpeg|Internal view File:CaptionCall 78T Top.jpeg|Main Board top File:CaptionCall 78T Bottom.jpeg|Main Board bottom File:CaptionCall 78T KeyPad Board Top.jpeg|Keypad Board top File:CaptionCall 78T KeyPad Board Bottom.jpeg|Keypad Board bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
